answers.answer: Hi!To treat a plexopathy (involvement of blood vessels, nerves and lymphatic channels), it is important to find the cause. Most important causes of lumbo-sacral plexopathy are diabetes and other metabolic disorders, collagen vascular disorders, infection, trauma, nerve entrapment, cancer and autoimmune disorders. Hence you need complete investigations regarding these. Treating the cause reduces the symptoms considerably. Also, pain killers, muscle relaxers and rest are the other treatment modalities followed. In some cases like nerve entrapment, physiotherapy is the main stay of treatment. Please discuss this with your specialist.
